entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 10.
